name: Heaven's Treasure
description:
This game is made for the N8Jam.

You are an adventurer hunting for the artifact called Heaven. Other adventurers had tried to obtain the artifact, but they never returned alive. And now, it's your turn to get Heaven. Will you escape with great treasures or with great danger?

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move your character.

This game is fully developed by me, but I used Kenney Blocks as fonts.
